trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for Triple Data Encryption Standard algorithms from which all TripleDES implementations must derive.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for tre ganger Data Encryption Standard algoritmer implementeringer må avledes fra som alle TripleDES.

trans-unit.source: TripleDES uses three successive iterations of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: TripleDES bruker tre etterfølgende gjentakelser av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: It can use either two or three 56-bit keys.
trans-unit.target: Det kan bruke to eller tre 56-biters nøkler.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En nyere, symmetriske krypteringsalgoritmen, Avansert Encryption AES (Standard), er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> class and its derived classes instead of the TripleDES class.
trans-unit.target: Vurder å bruke den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>klassen og de avledede klassene i stedet for TripleDES klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: Use TripleDES only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TripleDES bare for kompatibilitet med eldre programmer og data.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 128 bits til 192 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet koden vil opprette en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the protected fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm> class to the default values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden initialiserer beskyttede feltene for den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>klassen til standardverdiene oppført i tabellen nedenfor.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: |Field|Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|192| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|64| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|
trans-unit.target: | Feltet | Standardverdien | |-----------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|&192; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|&64; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en kryptografisk objektet til å utføre den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES>klassen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES>

trans-unit.source: An instance of a cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av et kryptografisk objekt.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en kryptografisk objektet til å utføre den angitte implementeringen av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på bestemte implementeringen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av et kryptografisk objekt.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is weak.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er svake.

trans-unit.source: Weak keys are keys that result in ciphers that are easy to break.
trans-unit.target: Svake nøkler er nøkler som forårsaker chiffreringer som er lett å bryte.

trans-unit.source: If text is encrypted with a weak key, encrypting the resulting cipher again with the same weak key returns the original text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis teksten er kryptert med en svake nøkkel, returnerer kryptering resulterende cipher på nytt med samme svake nøkkel den opprinnelige teksten.

trans-unit.source: In 128-bit mode, if the first 64 bits are the same as the last 64 bits, the key is weak.
trans-unit.target: I 128-bit-modus, hvis de første 64-bitene er den samme som de siste 64-bitene er nøkkelen svake.

trans-unit.source: In 192-bit mode, if the first 64 bits are the same as the second 64 bits or if the second 64 bits are the same as the last 64 bits, the key is weak.
trans-unit.target: Modusen 192 bits er hvis de første 64-bitene er den samme som de andre 64-bitene eller andre 64-biters er den samme som de siste 64-bitene nøkkelen svake.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set a weak key results in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en svake key resulterer i en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a random key, a weak key will never be returned.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>kalles for å opprette en tilfeldig nøkkel, en svake nøkkel aldri returneres.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to test for weakness.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel for testing svakhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is weak; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen er svake; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the rgbKey parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på den rgbKey parameteren er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secret key for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hemmelig nøkkel for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 128 bits til 192 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: The secret key for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the key to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å sette nøkkelen til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a key whose length is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi en nøkkel lengden er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: -or- An attempt was made to set a weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey*>).
trans-unit.target: - eller - ble gjort et forsøk på å angi en svake nøkkel (se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey*>).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey*>
